participant_1.background:
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains.
i came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago.
I miss my father every day.
I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
i am one of four siblings.

participant_2.background:
My stamp collection was stolen, but I still have my dog, who is my best friend.
my life s passion is designer french fries.
I love working out with music to help push myself.
I have a special place in my heart for the people who have signed my autograph book.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.

content.text: Hi, I'm from Japan and I came to teach high school in the US over 10 years ago.
Hi, I'm from the US and I love designer french fries.
I miss my dad, he passed away a few years ago, but I still have my dog.
My stamp collection was stolen, but my dog is my best friend.
I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
I have a special place in my heart for the people who have signed my autograph book.
I have four siblings, but I'm not very close to any of them.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
I love skiing and the mountains.
I love working out with music to help push myself.
